item.title: [GRA7][PaaS] - Maintenance operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 7, 20:00 UTC  -  Nov 8, 02:00 UTC

Nov 2, 11:33 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/11/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 08/11/2022 02:00 UTC
Service Impact : Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs.
Service improvement : Our partner will perform maintenance in the GRA7 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.
All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

item.title: [GRA2][Webhosting] - Cluster 07 - Filerz384
item.description:
Nov 3, 19:18 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/11/2022 14:37 UTC
End Time : 03/11/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : No more slowness on hosted websites.
Root cause : A network issue
Current status : Resolved

Nov 3, 14:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/11/2022 14:37 UTC
Service impact : We are currently experiencing slowness on some hosted websites.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA2
Scope of impact : All offers on cluster07 may experience latency.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investiating the source of this incident.

All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

item.title: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Filerz1014 - Cluster 026

The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Current status : Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : Geographical DC to precise

Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.
